name: chanjo_sambamba_coverage_v1.11
title: coverage using sambamba and chanjo v1.11
summary: v1.11 - coverage using sambamba and chanjo

inputSpec.name: merge_overlapping_mate_reads
inputSpec.label: count overlapping mate reads once
inputSpec.help: Should overlapping mate reads be counted once? True = counted once. False = counted twice

inputSpec.name: coverage_level
inputSpec.label: coverage level
inputSpec.help: The level of coverage to be reported.

inputSpec.name: min_base_qual
inputSpec.label: min base quality score (-q)
inputSpec.help: The minimum base quality score required to be counted.

inputSpec.name: min_mapping_qual
inputSpec.label: min mapping quality score
inputSpec.help: The minimum mapping quality score required to be counted.

outputSpec.name: chanjo_raw_output
outputSpec.label: chanjo raw output
outputSpec.help: A json file output by chanjo (which is then parsed to create the reported output) and a bedfile that is output by sambamba (and used by chanjo).

outputSpec.name: chanjo_yaml
outputSpec.label: chanjo yaml config file
outputSpec.help: A YAML file used as the config settings for chanjo.

outputSpec.name: chanjo_output_to_report
outputSpec.label: chanjo output to download
outputSpec.help: Two files that contain the output from sambamba and chanjo, and cleaned so it can be imported to moka or provide exon level coverage
